description: This adults-only fruit salad recipe will wow guests with its rum-infused stone fruit, hazelnut praline and berry sorbet.
name: Boozy Stone Fruit Salad With Hazelnut Praline Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine hazelnuts, sugar and 1 tbs rum in a bowl. Spread mixture on tray. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until sugar has melted and mixture is golden. Cool on tray. Roughly chop.
Combine fruit in a bowl. Add remaining rum and toss to combine. Stand for 30 minutes to allow flavours to infuse.
Divide fruit between bowls. Add a scoop of sorbet and top with hazelnut praline. Serve immediately.
